alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Jefferson; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:20PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow showers, some with locally heavy bursts of snow with quick accumulations around a coating to an inch. Total snow accumulation 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of north central and western Maryland, central, northwest and western Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier bursts of snow in snow showers will briefly reduce visibility to around one-quarter mile and quickly cover surfaces through early this evening. Be prepared for rapidly changing situations when driving through the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Berkeley; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Jefferson; Morgan
